items.title: Apple plans to hire 20,000 workers over the next four years but faces competition for AI talent
items.description: Companies across every sector are pursuing top tech talent.

items.title: Attacks on DEI assume a level playing field where none exists—and threaten America’s future prosperity
items.description: Nowhere is the danger more apparent than at the intersection of race and gender—and for Black breadwinner moms in particular.

items.title: Unilever bets on ‘maverick’ new CEO to accelerate shake-up, ousting Hein Schumacher
items.description: "The step-up from CFO to CEO by Fernandez will be liked by many investors," Jefferies analyst David Hayes said of the Unilever CEO transition.

items.title: Milan Fashion Week dazzles with Gucci opening, but luxury sector struggles with slowdown
items.description: As Milan’s runways light up with glamour, the fashion world grapples with slumping sales, China’s slowdown, and a luxury market under pressure.

items.title: MSCI CEO: The 5 D’s reshaping global investing
items.description: Henry Fernandez says twin revolutions in data and technology are driving five big investment trends.
